articles.description: Yes, 'Top Gun: Maverick' made the list. Yes, we’re as surprised as you are.
articles.content: While 2021 was largely defined by its proximity to the start of the Covid-19 pandemic, when worldwide lockdowns and cinema closings forced moviegoers to establish new viewing habits, 2022 seemed to b… [+11605 chars]
